text:
The FDA is asking hand sanitizer manufacturers to add denatured alcohol to make them taste bad — to stop people drinking it, after President Trump suggested drinking disinfectants to treat coronavirus.

"Hand sanitizers are not proven to treat COVID-19." https://t.co/blwFMC28uQ
